edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class Physics

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Physics

  • public class Physics
extends java.lang.Object
    Game designers can configure the physics of a level (i.e., the default forces, if any), via this class. Internally, the class constructs a box2d physics world and instantiates the callbacks needed to ensure that LOL works correctly.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static void configure(float defaultXGravity,
             float defaultYGravity)
        Configure physics for the current level
        Parameters:
        defaultXGravity - The default force moving entities to the left (negative) or right (positive)... Usually zero
        defaultYGravity - The default force pushing the hero down (negative) or up (positive)... Usually zero or -10
